alert.note: Alert for Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Mitchell, northern Rooks, Jewell, Smith, northern Osborne, Phillips and southwestern Webster Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Inavale to near Athol to near Logan. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Smith Center, Red Cloud, Athol and Inavale around 250 AM CDT. Gaylord, Speed and Bellaire around 255 AM CDT. Harlan around 300 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Portis, Stockton, Downs, Burr Oak, Ionia, Mankato, Cawker City, Glen Elder and Woodston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
